_sText:
This version is for the noob b-hoppers who can't get past the first level. I made hops more close together for levels 1 and 3. All other hops are the same. I added the maps title inside the map outside the window to the left on level one. Got rid of window straight ahead when first connecting to the map. Refer to screen shots for more information about how i changed levels 1 and 3. 

Enjoy simplicity.
